title: Docker and partners launch GenAI Stack for developers
description:
During the day two DockerCon keynote, Docker – in collaboration with partners Neo4j, LangChain, and Ollama – introduced the GenAI Stack. This innovative platform is meticulously designed to empower developers to kickstart their generative AI applications within minutes, eliminating the complexities associated with integrating diverse technologies. The GenAI Stack offers a seamless solution by providing... Read more »

The post Docker and partners launch GenAI Stack for developers appeared first on Developer Tech News.
